Blog.post: Hello to all, Well the only way i can effectively begin my blog is by first saying my amazing adventure of the flights. As some people know i left home at 7:00 AM. Mind you my flight was not scheduled to leave until nine AM. When i get there i find out that my flight has been canceled because of a shortage of the crew, which was what i found out through my friend's mother: stella, who is one of the best and kindest people in this world. We were on standby, which means that if there was room in one of the later flights i would get in. My friends' Marlene and Dalia were in the same dilema. there were four available seats in the eleven o clock flight, there was no room in the ten oclock flight. THe only plus side to the ten oclock flight was that I met the Mayor of chicago and took a picture with him, actually Marlene is in the picture also. Anyway people who had paid for the eleven oclock flight came which left only two available seats in that flight. Unfortinately because of the way the alphabet is i was unable to go so both my friends went. I did not feel bad because luckily thanks to my papi and my cousin David i had my laptop in my bookbag. Therefore i played minesweeper until the battery went out which was around the time when the twelve-fifty flight left. Me being the one who was already close to two hours later than both my friends, had to go through a lot of paperwork and was unable to go to my room, to which i lost my swipe card to by the way, so i could not enter the dorm building. Which was great all on it's own. by the time i took all my bags to the fourth floor, to where my room was, i was hungry-verrrryyyyy hungry- so we decided to go out and eat, there is a chinese place here that makes the best shrimp fried rice. I dont think i can take some over there but i think that i can give it a try. Anyways my friend Dalia and i were surprised to find out that a the person i was sharing my bathroom with, was indeed a BOY. Exactly imagine how i felt. I slept in my friends bed that night because i thought it creepy to sleep in a room next to a boy who had total access to my bedroom not to mention my bathroom, Yiuuuckkkk. This was how my firts day was, eventhough i went through a lot i got to meet a lot of people who live in my "appartment building" For your information i changed my bedroom location the very next day at eleven in the morning and also got a new swipe card in order to actually get in and out of the building. I hope that helps you sleep better. La version en Castellano...
